text: You, you those who believed, why (is it) to you, if (it) is said to you: "Rush/hasten in God`s sake ," you become heavy/burdened in the earth/Planet Earth? Did you accept/become content with the life the present/worldly life, (other) than the end (other life)? So the present world`s/worldly life`s long life/enjoyment is not except little/small in the end (other life)
